column1: With almost 30% of the season over - the Clippers are #1 in Net Rating (+7.8). Since Lue stopped playing Reggie Jackson, Lou Williams, and Luke Kennard together off the bench, the Clippers have sported a league high +14 net rating over the last 11 games
